content:
Yes, Anoushka Shankar has collaborated with a wide range of musicians from different genres. Here are a few examples of her collaborations with other artists:

1. "Inside Me" - a collaboration with rapper M.I.A. that blends sitar riffs with electronic beats and political lyrics.

2. "Cler Achel" - a collaboration with Tuareg guitarist Bombino that combines traditional Indian music with West African guitar riffs.

3. "Kerala" - a collaboration with electronic artist Praveen Sharma (AKA Braille) that features complex rhythms and hypnotic sitar melodies.

4. "Lasya" - a collaboration with flamenco guitarist Pepe Habichuela that combines Indian ragas with flamenco rhythms.

These are just a few examples of Anoushka Shankar's collaborations. She has worked with many other musicians as well, including jazz saxophonist Joshua Redman, percussionist Karsh Kale, and tabla player Tanmoy Bose.
